title: (x) Hera logo serif face - Rotis Serif {Dav}
content:
Would anyone happen to know the HERA font as seen here:

[http://www.albertaspromise.org/public/data/photos/newlogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811070718/http:/www.albertaspromise.org/public/data/photos/newlogo.jpg "http://www.albertaspromise.org/public/data/photos/newlogo.jpg")

Thanks!

author: joesomebody
